featured.text: A new analysis of satellite-based data has given precisely the rate 21 which the country is losing size as it pushes northward against the Himalayas.

other.text: Using empirical data from laboratory experiments 28 observations of a mid-sized Japanese bank in real life, researchers find that weather conditions indeed influence a worker’s focus.

definition.zh_def: 數據的單數形式，指一個具體的數據點或信息。
definition.en_def: A single piece of information or a data point.
definition.example: Each datum collected during the experiment was carefully analyzed.
